page.title: 13CUSTOMS,XMAS TREE LIGHTING.
page.content: When driving up in the car you could see the cubs' torches and feel the merry atmosphere of it all.And walking to stand in your place being greeted merrily by everyone.Every single person was in a happy Christmassy mood.Everyone stood round dressed up in warm coats and woollies and the younger ones cluthing dolls or teddies to keep them company.You held a hymn sheet and waited expectantly.Firstly a few words were said by the Vicar then Christmas hymns were sung in various merry voices.An invited Mayor gave a speech then proudly lit the Christmas tree lights.The little ones were tugging at their mothers' sleeves saying "want to ghome now!"when they were interrupted by a deep voice inviting them to the Village hall for tea and biscuits.And the crowd full of Christmas spirit would troup along to the hall.
